[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” gap=”20″ css=”.vc_custom_1726600348690{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 160px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background-image: url(https://biryaniustad.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/bg-slider.png?id=6986) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”Banner”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”7200″ img_size=”full” css=””][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text css=””]

Signature Biryani!

Hyderabad Biryani is the epitome of culinary excellence, capturing the essence of Hyderabad’s rich food culture. Crafted with long-grain basmati rice and succulent pieces of meat, this biryani is seasoned with a meticulously balanced blend of spices, saffron, and herbs. The dish is prepared using the traditional dum cooking method, where the ingredients are slow-cooked in a sealed pot, allowing the flavors to deeply infuse and meld together. Each bite of the Hyderabad Signature Biryani reveals layers of aromatic spices, tender meat, and perfectly cooked rice, offering a taste of the royal heritage that defines Hyderabad’s gastronomic legacy. Accompanied by raita and a side of mirchi ka salan, this biryani is not just a meal but a celebration of time-honored flavors and textures.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”]

PARTY PACKS
[vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1726599624578{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;background-image: url(https://biryaniustad.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/about-bg.jpg?id=6969) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”Biryani Ustad”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1487077101223{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1585318243747{margin-top: 115px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”BIRYANI USTAD” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:left|color:%23252525″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1726599645216{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1726599681168{margin-top: 62px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

At Biryani Ustad, we elevate biryani to a fine art, blending tradition and taste in every aromatic plate. With recipes passed down through generations and perfected over time, our biryanis are crafted using only the freshest ingredients and authentic spices. Whether you’re craving the timeless Hyderabadi Biryani, a royal Mughlai Biryani, or a flavorful Vegetarian Biryani, we promise a culinary experience like no other.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1726599693757{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Our Signature Biryani

Every dish at Biryani Ustad is an ode to the rich history of biryani. Our range includes succulent chicken, mutton, seafood, and vegetarian options, each prepared with fragrant basmati rice, slow-cooked meats, and a medley of spices that create an irresistible symphony of flavors.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1726599710939{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Why Dine at Biryani Ustad?

  • Authenticity: We use traditional cooking methods and time-honored recipes to bring the true essence of biryani to your plate.
  • Master Chefs: Our expert chefs are the true Ustads (masters) in biryani-making, ensuring each dish is a masterpiece.
  • Cozy Ambiance: Dine in a setting that offers comfort with a touch of cultural flair, perfect for family gatherings or intimate meals.
  • Quick Delivery: Enjoy the taste of Biryani Ustad at home with our fast and reliable delivery service.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”120px”][vc_single_image image=”7252″ img_size=”720×540″ css=””][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1726599601007{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_id=”Try Our Services”][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1585316882601{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”110px”][vc_column_text css=””]

We deliver your food in safe conditions!

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space]

PARTY ORDERS

Restaurant Address

[vc_empty_space height=”750px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1726599745141{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://biryaniustad.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/healthyfood-home-section1-background.jpg?id=6028) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”Soups”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1487164478469{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1487939823538{margin-top: 120px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”SOUPS” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:center|color:%23252525″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1726598180309{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Warm your soul with our flavorful, handcrafted soups, made to comfort and delight.” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24|text_align:center|color:%23252525|line_height:20px” google_fonts=”font_family:Ubuntu%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1726603245630{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”66px”]

MUTTON MARAG

Mutton Marag is a rich and flavorful Hyderabadi soup made from tender mutton and spices. It's often served as a starter at weddings and special occasions.

₹ 4500
Serves 25 Pax

CHICKEN MARAG

Chicken Marag is a rich and creamy Hyderabadi chicken soup, simmered with aromatic spices and cashew paste, perfect as a flavorful starter or light main.

₹ 3500
Serves 25 Pax
[vc_empty_space height=”66px”]
PARTY ORDERS
[vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1726599758975{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://biryaniustad.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/pasta-home-section3-background.jpg?id=5883) !important;}” el_id=”Starters”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1487164478469{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1487943651021{margin-top: 120px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”STARTERS” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1726598306230{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Savor the essence of Hyderabad with every bite of its delectable starters, where tangy, spicy, and aromatic flavors come together in a culinary celebration!” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:20px” google_fonts=”font_family:Ubuntu%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1726603441287{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”65px”]

TALAHUVA MUTTON

Talahuwa Mutton is a rich and spicy dish made with tender mutton that's slow-cooked in a blend of spices and herbs. It's a traditional recipe known for its intense flavors and hearty texture.

₹ 5000
Serves 30 Pax

DUM KA KHEEMA

Dum Ka Kheema is a delicious, slow-cooked minced meat dish that’s popular in Hyderabadi cuisine. The dish is rich, flavorful, and fragrant due to the blend of spices and the ``dum`` (slow-cooking) technique.

₹ 5000
Serves 33 Pax

CHICKEN GHEE ROAST

Chicken Ghee Roast is a flavorful and spicy South Indian dish originating from Mangalore. It’s made with marinated chicken, slow-cooked in aromatic spices and rich ghee, giving it a unique depth of flavor.

₹ 5000
Serves 33 Pax

TAWA TANDOORI CHICKEN

Tawa Tandoori Chicken is a delicious variation of the classic tandoori chicken, where the marinated chicken is cooked on a tawa (griddle) instead of a tandoor. This method gives it a smoky, charred flavor, while still being juicy and tender.

₹ 5000
Serves 33 Pax
[vc_empty_space height=”65px”]
PARTY ORDERS
[vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1727027660825{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://biryaniustad.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/healthyfood-home-section1-background.jpg?id=6028) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_id=”#MainCourse”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1487164478469{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1487939823538{margin-top: 120px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”MAIN COURSE” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:center|color:%23252525″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1726622850098{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Indulge in the rich and aromatic flavors of our Hyderabadi main course, where traditional spices and slow-cooked meats create a feast for the senses.” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24|text_align:center|color:%23252525|line_height:20px” google_fonts=”font_family:Ubuntu%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1726623751406{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”66px”]

MUTTON HALEEM

Mutton Haleem is a rich, slow-cooked delicacy made with tender mutton, wheat, lentils, and a variety of aromatic spices. This popular dish, often enjoyed during Ramadan, has a creamy, porridge-like consistency and is packed with flavors.

₹ 5500
Serves 30 Pax

CHICKEN HALEEM

Chicken Haleem is a hearty and flavorful dish made by slow-cooking chicken with wheat, lentils, and spices. It's a popular dish during Ramadan and festive occasions, known for its rich, creamy texture and comforting taste.

₹ 4000
Serves 30 Pax

DUM KA MUTTON

Dum Ka Mutton is a rich and flavorful Hyderabadi dish where mutton is marinated in a blend of aromatic spices and yogurt, then slow-cooked (dum) in a sealed pot to achieve tender, melt-in-your-mouth meat and deep flavors.

₹ 5500
Serves 25 Pax

SHAADI KI LAAL MURG

Shaadi Ki Laal Chicken is a vibrant, spicy, and flavorful North Indian dish traditionally served at weddings. The deep red color comes from red chilies and spices, making it a standout dish with rich, bold flavors.

₹ 4500
Serves 25 Pax

KADAI KAJU PANEER

Experience the vibrant flavors of Kadai Kaju Paneer, where creamy paneer dances with crunchy cashews in a spicy, aromatic gravy. A celebration of textures and tastes that will leave you craving more!

₹ 4500
Serves 25 Pax

VEG KHOYA KHORMA

Indulge in the rich and creamy Vegetable Khoya Khorma, where fresh veggies meld beautifully with aromatic spices and luscious khoya. A luxurious dish that elevates any dining experience!

₹ 4000
Serves 25 Pax

DILL NAAN

Dill Naan is a soft and flavorful Indian flatbread infused with the fresh taste of dill leaves. It’s an aromatic variation of traditional naan, perfect to serve with curries, kebabs, or gravies.

₹ 400
Serves 20 Pax

ROMALI ROTI

Romali Roti is a thin and soft Indian flatbread that is known for its large size and delicate texture, often served with tandoori dishes or rich curries. The name ``Romali`` means ``handkerchief,`` referring to how thin and soft the roti is.

₹ 400
Serves 20 Pax
[vc_empty_space height=”66px”]
PARTY ORDERS
[vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1726599790648{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://biryaniustad.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/pizza-home-section3-background.jpg?id=5952) !important;}” el_id=”Biryani’s”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1487164478469{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1487944042993{margin-top: 120px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”BIRYANI’S” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1726598617812{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Indulge in the royal taste of our Hyderabadi biryanis, where every bite is a symphony of rich flavors and fragrant spices.” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff|line_height:20px” google_fonts=”font_family:Ubuntu%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1726603514747{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”65px”]

CHICKEN DUM BIRYANI

Chicken Dum Biryani is a fragrant and flavorful dish made by layering marinated chicken with partially cooked basmati rice, then slow-cooking it on ``dum`` (steam) in a sealed pot. This method allows the chicken to absorb the spices, resulting in tender, juicy pieces

₹ 3600
Serves 30 Pax

MUTTON DUM BIRYANI

Mutton Dum Biryani is a royal and aromatic dish made by slow-cooking marinated mutton and partially cooked rice on ``dum`` (steam) in a sealed pot. This method infuses the meat with spices and ensures tender, flavorful bites of mutton with fragrant, fluffy rice.

₹ 5300
Serves 30 Pax

EGG DUM BIRYANI

Indulge in the fragrant layers of Egg Dum Biryani, where perfectly spiced eggs meet aromatic basmati rice. A royal dish that transforms every meal into a celebration!

₹ 3600Serves 30 Pax

VEG DUM BIRYANI

It is a flavorful and aromatic rice dish made by layering spiced mixed vegetables with partially cooked basmati rice, then slow-cooked on ``dum`` (steam) in a sealed pot. The slow-cooking process infuses the vegetables with fragrant spices, resulting in a richly spiced fluffy rice.

₹ 3500
Serves 30 Pax

PANEER BIRYANI

Paneer Biryani is a delicious and aromatic dish made by layering marinated paneer cubes with partially cooked basmati rice, then slow-cooked on ``dum`` (steam). The paneer absorbs the rich spices, resulting in a flavorful and fragrant biryani with soft, juicy paneer pieces and fluffy rice.

₹ 4500
Serves 30 Pax

JACKFRUIT BIRYANI

**Jackfruit Biryani** is a unique and flavorful dish where tender, marinated jackfruit is layered with partially cooked basmati rice and slow-cooked on ``dum`` (steam). The jackfruit mimics the texture of meat, absorbing aromatic spices, resulting in a rich, fragrant biryani with a satisfying bite.

₹ 4500
Serves 30 Pax
[vc_empty_space height=”65px”]
PARTY ORDERS
[vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1726599805185{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://biryaniustad.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/healthyfood-home-section1-background.jpg?id=6028) !important;}” el_id=”Desserts”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1487164478469{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1487945355313{margin-top: 120px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”DESSERTS” font_container=”tag:h1|text_align:center|color:%23252525″ use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1726599051962{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”End your meal on a sweet note with our indulgent desserts, a perfect blend of tradition and delight.” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24|text_align:center|color:%23252525|line_height:20px” google_fonts=”font_family:Ubuntu%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C500%2C500italic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1726603592948{margin-top: 20px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”65px”]

DOUBLE KA MEETHA

Dry Fruits Double Ka Meetha is a rich and indulgent Hyderabadi dessert made from deep-fried bread slices soaked in sugar syrup and flavored with cardamom. It is then garnished with a generous amount of dry fruits and saffron, resulting in a sweet, creamy, and crunchy delight.

₹ 3000
Serves 30 Pax

QUBANI KA MEETHA

It is a traditional Hyderabadi dessert made from dried apricots that are soaked, stewed, and sweetened to form a thick, jam-like consistency. It is typically served with a dollop of fresh cream or vanilla ice cream, offering a perfect balance of sweetness and tanginess.

₹ 3500
Serves 30 Pax

ZAFRANI KADDU KA KHEER

Zafrani Kaddu Ka Kheer is a rich and creamy dessert made from grated pumpkin, slow-cooked in milk and flavored with saffron (zafran), cardamom, and sugar. The saffron adds a beautiful aroma and golden hue, making it a decadent, aromatic, and flavorful sweet dish.

₹ 3500
Serves 30 Pax

GAZAR KA HALWA

Gazar Ka Halwa is a traditional Indian dessert made from grated carrots slowly cooked with milk, sugar, and ghee. It's flavored with cardamom and garnished with nuts and dried fruits, resulting in a rich, sweet, and aromatic treat.

₹ 4000
Serves 30 Pax

BADAM KI KUND

Badam Ki Kund is a rich and creamy dessert made from almonds (badam) and milk, often sweetened with sugar and flavored with cardamom. It has a smooth texture and is typically garnished with more almonds or other nuts, offering a luxurious and satisfying treat.

₹ 6000
Serves 30 Pax

BREAD HALWA

Delight in the warm, buttery richness of Bread Halwa, where toasted bread meets luscious sweetness and fragrant cardamom. A comforting dessert that turns simple ingredients into pure bliss!

₹ 3000Serves 30 Pax
